summary: The client requested updates to NFR 1 to align with the vision statement, while the developer confirmed completion of updates to helloworld.py for new output logic. Directory listings of project files were shared by the Architect and PM, with QA providing no comment.

actions.task: Provide code diff or further tweaks to helloworld.py if requested
